resources.string: Please note that this is still work in progress.
If you run into bug which you want to get fixed or have any suggestion, don\'t hesitate to contact me by e-mail or use issue tracker on project\'s homepage.
Press menu if you want to add new folder.
Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
Are you sure you want to delete selected puzzle?
Are you sure you want to reset selected puzzle?
Congratulations, you have solved the puzzle in %s.
Are you sure you want to restart this game?
Are you sure you want to clear all notes?
Highlight values which break rules of sudoku.
Edit cell value and note in popup.
Select number, then just tap on cell to set its value.
Select number, then just tap on cell to note this number.
Show numpad which acts as standard numeric keyobard.

There are several input modes which you can use to edit puzzle content. In order to help you get familiar with these modes there will be several hints displayed as you go through game controls.\n\nYou can disable these hints in game settings.
You\'re in the Popup input mode. Tap any cell with finger to edit its content or use keyobard.
Now press button in the lower right corner to switch to another input mode.
You\'re now in the Single number mode. First press any number button.
Now just start tapping on the cells, number %s will be written there.
Press button %s again to deselect it. Now if you tap cell, you will clear its value.
This is Single number note mode. This time you\'re editing cell\'s notes.
This is Numpad mode, it acts as a standard numeric keyobard.
OK, now you\'re back in the Popup mode.
Remember that you can disable any of the input modes in the game settings.
Show hints which will guide you through application controls.
